00023 namespace x2d {
00024 namespace graphics {
00025        
00030 class graphics_engine_bare
00031 {
00032 public:
00036     void init();
00037     void shutdown();
00038     
00039     void create_frame_buffer(); 
00040     void destroy_frame_buffer();
00041     void set_current_context();
00042     void start_frame();    
00043     void clear();
00044     void present_frame();
00045     
00046     void set_render_buf_storage_cb( const boost::function<void()>& f )
00047     {
00048         render_buf_storage_ = f;
00049     }
00050     
00051     void set_cur_ctx_cb( const boost::function<void()>& f )
00052     {
00053         set_cur_ctx_ = f;
00054     }
00055     
00056     void set_present_render_buffer_cb( const boost::function<void()>& f )
00057     {
00058         present_render_buffer_ = f;
00059     }
00060 
00061     void set_shutdown_cb( const boost::function<void()>& f )
00062     {
00063         shutdown_ = f;
00064     }    
00065     
00066 private:
00067     GLint backing_width_;
00068     GLint backing_height_;
00069     
00070     GLuint view_render_buf_;
00071     GLuint view_frame_buf_;
00072     GLuint depth_render_buf_;
00073     
00074     // callbacks for platform dependant stuff
00075     boost::function<void()> render_buf_storage_;
00076     boost::function<void()> set_cur_ctx_;
00077     boost::function<void()> present_render_buffer_;
00078     boost::function<void()> shutdown_;
00079 };
00080 
00081 typedef boost::details::pool::singleton_default<graphics_engine_bare> graphics_engine;
